original_text: You complained to each other in your tents. You said, ‘The Lord hates us. That is why he brought us out of Egypt. He wanted to give us to the Amorites, so that they would kill us.
korean_text: 장막 중에서 원망하여 이르기를 여호와께서 우리를 미워하시므로 아모리 족속의 손에 넘겨 멸하시려고 우리를 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내셨도다

sentences.original_text: That is why he brought us out of Egypt.
He wanted to give us to the Amorites,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리를 아모리 사람들에게 넘기려 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: so that they would kill us.'
